title: Prime customers who have access to bank credit and are satisfied with the current product
description: These customers are loyal and happy with their existing banking experience.
label: Satisfied

title: Prime customers who have access to bank credit but are not satisfied with the current service
description: These customers are underserved and could be open to switching banks.
label: Underserved

title: Customers from near-prime and sub-prime segments with no access to bank credit
description: These customers are underbanked and need better financial inclusion opportunities.
label: Underbanked
